mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore with West Virginia mailmen
mdRecord.dcterms:description: West Virginia mailmen asking Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. to help carry the mail on a legislative proposal to ease size and weight restrictions on parcel post packages. From left to right: Clyde Olver and Robert F. Glassgow of Wheeling; R.B. Smith of Wallace; Congressman Moore; Albert Moore and Walter W. Williams of Clarksburg.
